name: Shaderoo
description:
Shaderoo is a friendly puzzle game about node based programming and shaders. Learn the basic principles by solving the puzzles, then create your own graphics and animations in sandbox mode.

Some tips:

  • Use the “delete” key to get rid of selected boxes and wires.
  • If you have a mouse with scroll wheel, you can scroll while hovering over numbers to change them quickly.
  • Hold down “shift” to make fine adjustments while changing number values.

In sandbox mode, there are many additional operators and functions borrowed from shader programming. You can learn more about these in this glossary: https://thebookofshaders.com/glossary/
